settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: Water/Eau, Propanediol, Centella Asiatica Leaf Water, Polyester-5, Pentylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Betaine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Butylene Glycol, Trehalose, Polyglyceryl-2 Oleate, Octyldodeceth-16, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Thuja Occidentalis Leaf Oil, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Extract, Cryptomeria Japonica Leaf Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Saccharomyces Ferment, Tocopherol, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Paeonia Albiflora Flower Extract

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content: Shake well before use. Before and after makeup, evenly spray several times onto the face from a distance of 12 inches.

settings.text:
• High Shine Gloss: This lip oil offers a lightweight but robust shine with highly refractive and nourishing oils.
  • Multi-use: Apply on bare lips or over color products for an elevated look or apply before bed as an intensive lip mask treatment at night.
  • Hybrid Skincare: Appreciated as both a cosmetic and skincare product, this lip oil gives aesthetic benefits while infusing the lips with moisturization and protection.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
